sentences.en: Don't forget, I have always kept the money rolling in.
sentences.cn: 不要忘记，我总是有大量钱财滚滚而来。

sentences.en: Don’t spend all your money on the first day of your holiday!
sentences.cn: 别在度假的第一天就把钱都花完了！

sentences.en: For my money, it's not worth the trouble.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，不值得这样费力

sentences.en: for my money, they're one of the best bands around.
sentences.cn: 据我看来，他们是此地最好乐队之一。

sentences.en: He was a high-earning broker with money to burn.
sentences.cn: 他是高收入的经纪人，有花不完的钱。

sentences.en: I could use some money, Sarah told him flatly.
sentences.cn: 萨拉态度坚决地告诉他，我可以用一部分钱。

sentences.en: I spent lots of money on smart new outfits for work.
sentences.cn: 我花大笔钱购置了上班时穿的漂亮新套装。

sentences.en: I think that is a total waste of money.
sentences.cn: 我认为那完全是浪费金钱。

sentences.en: It's just not enough money to start life over.
sentences.cn: 这些钱根本不够用来开始全新的生活。

sentences.en: Julian has been thinking up new ways of raising money.
sentences.cn: 朱利安想出了不少筹款的新办法。

sentences.en: Many of the leaders have become hooked on power and money.
sentences.cn: 很多领导人都变得贪恋权力和金钱。

sentences.en: she won't have him back—I'd put money on it.
sentences.cn: 她不会让他回来了——我敢打赌。

sentences.en: She'd do anything for a bit of pin money.
sentences.cn: 为了挣点外快，她什么都肯做。

sentences.en: Stein rolled up the paper bag with the money inside.
sentences.cn: 斯坦把装了钱的纸袋卷了起来。

sentences.en: The family made their money in the woollen trade.
sentences.cn: 这家人是做毛纺生意赚的钱。

sentences.en: The money to build the power station ought to have been sufficient.
sentences.cn: 建设电站的资金本该足够了。

sentences.en: The repairs will cost quite a lot of money.
sentences.cn: 修理要花一大笔钱。

sentences.en: The Swiss wanted to discourage an inflow of foreign money.
sentences.cn: 瑞士人想要阻止外资流入。

sentences.en: They siphon foreign aid money into their personal bank accounts.
sentences.cn: 他们把国外救济金非法转入了个人银行账户。

sentences.en: Use recorded delivery for large cheques or money orders.
sentences.cn: 对于大额的支票和汇款单要使用挂号邮寄。

sentences.en: We gave the gate money to the St John Ambulance brigade.
sentences.cn: 我们将门票收入都捐给了圣约翰急救队。

words.tran_cn: 货币主义的；以货币为基础的
[金融] 货币化；定为货币；货币铸造
使货币化；把…定位法定货币（等于monetize）
定为货币，使成为合法货币；铸造成货币

phrases.phrase: (the love of) money is the root of all evil

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)很富裕；赢了一大笔钱
[俚语](赛马时)下大赌注于最有希望获胜的马
依照某人的意见、选择或偏好
游资，（为追求高额利润而流动的）短期流动资金
&I{【体育运动】} &I{【游戏】} 在已下赌注的比赛中，如赛马，处于第一、第二或第三位的

phrases.phrase: money for old rope (或 money for jam)
phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)容易赚的钱；不费吹灰之力的收益

phrases.phrase: put money (或 put one's money) on
phrases.tran_cn: 确信…的真实性；确信…会成功

phrases.phrase: put one's money where one's mouth is
see the colour of someone's money
phrases.tran_cn: 得到某人付得起的证据

trans.tran_en: what you earn by working and can use to buy things. Money can be in the form of notes and coins or cheques, and can be kept in a bank
